english.segment1: There's a shadow coming. As the sky goes black. It's a stubborn rain. On a Nebraska plain
english.segment2: There's a farmer standing. On a thirsty ground. He holds his breath. This is life or death. It's only water
english.segment3: And it washes over me. Like a single river stone. Changes everything. But has no power on its own. It's only water
english.segment4: There's a winding canyon. Where a mountain stood. Miles of earth and clay. Carried far away
english.segment5: But there's something holy. In these cathedral walls. They took a lot of years. And a lot of tears. It's only water
english.segment6: There once was a wedding. All the wine was gone. They said He's just a man. That's where it all began. It was only water
